verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* against the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*;

Against \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, against the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Pharaoh-necho|strong="H6549"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which was by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w* in \w Carchemish|strong="H3751"\w*, which \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
\w Order|strong="H6186"\w* ye the \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* and \w shield|strong="H6793"\w*, and draw \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w Harness|strong="H0631"\w* the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and get \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, ye \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and stand \w forth|strong="H3320"\w* with \add your\add* \w helmets|strong="H3553"\w*; \w furbish|strong="H4838"\w* the \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, \add and\add* put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* the \w brigandines|strong="H5630"\w*.

Wherefore have I \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* them \w dismayed|strong="H2844"\w* \add and\add* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* away \w back|strong="H0268"\w*? and their mighty \w ones|strong="H1368"\w* are beaten \w down|strong="H3807"\w*, and are \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w apace|strong="H4498"\w*, and look not \w back|strong="H6437"\w*: \add for\add* \w fear|strong="H4032"\w* \add was\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 46.5 \ft beaten…: Heb. broken in pieces\f*\f + \fr 46.5 \ft fled…: Heb. fled a flight\f*

Let not the \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w*, nor the mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*; they shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*.

Who \add is\add* this \add that\add* cometh \w up|strong="H5927"\w* as a \w flood|strong="H2975"\w*, whose \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w moved|strong="H1607"\w* as the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*?

\w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* riseth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* like a \w flood|strong="H2975"\w*, and \add his\add* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w moved|strong="H1607"\w* like the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*; and he \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \add and\add* will \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; I will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof.

Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, ye \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and \w rage|strong="H1984"\w*, ye \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*; and let the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; the \w Ethiopians|strong="H3568"\w* and the \w Libyans|strong="H6316"\w*, that \w handle|strong="H8610"\w* the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*; and the \w Lydians|strong="H3866"\w*, that \w handle|strong="H8610"\w* \add and\add* \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*.\f + \fr 46.9 \ft the Ethiopians: Heb. Cush\f*\f + \fr 46.9 \ft the Libyans: Heb. Put\f*

For this \add is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*, that he may \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* him of his \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*: and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w*, and it shall be \w satiate|strong="H7646"\w* and made \w drunk|strong="H7301"\w* with their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: for the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*.

Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* shalt thou use \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w medicines|strong="H7499"\w*; \add for\add* thou shalt not be \w cured|strong="H8585"\w*.\f + \fr 46.11 \ft thou shalt…: Heb. no cure shall be unto thee\f*

The \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of thy \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*, and thy \w cry|strong="H6682"\w* hath \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for the mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* hath \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w* against the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, \add and\add* they are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, how \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* should \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* ye in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Migdol|strong="H4024"\w*, and \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w* and in \w Tahpanhes|strong="H8471"\w*: \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye, Stand \w fast|strong="H3320"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* thee; for the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee.

Why are thy \w valiant|strong="H0047"\w* \add men\add* swept \w away|strong="H5502"\w*? they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* not, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did \w drive|strong="H1920"\w* them.

He made \w many|strong="H7235"\w* to \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*, yea, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon \w another|strong="H7453"\w*: and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and let us go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to our own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of our \w nativity|strong="H4138"\w*, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w oppressing|strong="H3238"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 46.16 \ft made…: Heb. multiplied the faller\f*

They did \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* there, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add is but\add* a \w noise|strong="H7588"\w*; he hath \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* the time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*.

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Surely as \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w* \add is\add* among the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and as \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \add so\add* shall he \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

O thou \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w furnish|strong="H6213"\w* thyself to go into \w captivity|strong="H3627"\w*: for \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w* shall be \w waste|strong="H8047"\w* and \w desolate|strong="H3341"\w* without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 46.19 \ft furnish…: Heb. make thee instruments of captivity\f*

\w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add is like\add* a very \w fair|strong="H3304"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w*, \add but\add* \w destruction|strong="H7171"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*; it cometh \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

Also her hired \w men|strong="H7916"\w* \add are\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of her like \w fatted|strong="H4770"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H5695"\w*; for they also are turned \w back|strong="H6437"\w*, \add and\add* are fled \w away|strong="H5127"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: they did not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, because the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon them, \add and\add* the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w*.\f + \fr 46.21 \ft fatted…: Heb. bullocks of the stall\f*

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* thereof shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* like a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*; for they shall \w march|strong="H3212"\w* with an \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against her with \w axes|strong="H7134"\w*, as \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

They shall cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* her \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, though it cannot be \w searched|strong="H2713"\w*; because they are \w more|strong="H7231"\w* than the \w grasshoppers|strong="H0697"\w*, and \add are\add* \w innumerable|strong="H0369"\w*.

The \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall be \w confounded|strong="H3001"\w*; she shall be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*; Behold, I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w multitude|strong="H0527"\w* of \w No|strong="H4996"\w*, and \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, with their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; even \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \add all\add* them that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in him:\f + \fr 46.25 \ft multitude: or, nourisher: Heb. Amon\f*

And I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of those that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* it shall be \w inhabited|strong="H7931"\w*, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ But \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* not thou, O my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and be not \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for, behold, I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee from afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*; and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and be in \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* and at \w ease|strong="H7599"\w*, and none shall make \add him\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou not, O \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for I \add am\add* with thee; for I will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* thee: but I will not \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of thee, but \w correct|strong="H3256"\w* thee in \w measure|strong="H4941"\w*; yet will I not leave thee \w wholly|strong="H5352"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*.\f + \fr 46.28 \ft not leave…: or, not utterly cut thee off\f*
